StudyID.name: StudyID
StudyID.description: Unique 6-digit identifier for each participant in the study.

R0_OtherName.name: OtherName
R0_OtherName.question: Any other surnames (e.g., maiden name)?
R0_OtherName.description: Any other names, such as maiden name, given by the participant.

R0_AddrChanged.name: AddrChanged_1
R0_AddrChanged.question: Has your home address changed from the one at which we mailed you?
R0_AddrChanged.description: Has the participant moved addresses since filling out the last questionnaire?

R0_AddressLineOne.name: Address1
R0_AddressLineOne.question: If yes, please give your new address Home Address. address line 1

R0_PhoneOne.name: Phone1
R0_PhoneOne.question: Contact telephone number 1
R0_PhoneOne.description: The first given phone number of the participant.

R0_ExtOne.name: Ext1
R0_ExtOne.question: Contact telephone number 1 extension
R0_ExtOne.description: The extension for the first given phone number of the participant.

R0_DayEvnOne.name: DayEvn1_1
R0_DayEvnOne.question: when can you be contacted on telephone number 1?
R0_DayEvnOne.description: When can the participant be contacted on telephone number 1?

R0_PhoneTwo.name: Phone2
R0_PhoneTwo.question: Contact telephone number 2
R0_PhoneTwo.description: The second given phone number of the participant.

R0_ExtTwo.name: Ext2
R0_ExtTwo.question: Contact telephone number 2 extension
R0_ExtTwo.description: The extension for the second given phone number of the participant.

R0_DayEvnTwo.name: DayEvn2_1
R0_DayEvnTwo.question: when can you be contacted on telephone number 2?
R0_DayEvnTwo.description: When can the participant be contacted on telephone number 2?

R0_Email.name: Email
R0_Email.question: E-mail address
R0_Email.description: The email address given by the participant.

R0_EmailYN.name: EmailYN_1
R0_EmailYN.question: Would you be happy to be contacted by email in the future?
R0_EmailYN.description: If the participant be happy to be contacted by email in the future.

R0_GPdk.name: GPdn
R0_GPdk.question: Don't know the GP name
R0_GPdk.description: Participant doesn't know name of their GP.

R0_GPtown.name: GPtown
R0_GPtown.question: Town of your GP practice
R0_GPtown.description: Name of the town of the participant's GP.

R0_NHSnum.name: NHSnum
R0_NHSnum.question: What is your NHS number? (10 digit number on your GP registration card)

R0_Occupation.name: Occupation_1
R0_Occupation.question: What is your current occupation?
R0_Occupation.description: Current occupation type of the participant.
enumDescriptions: 0: Occupation - more than one option chosen.

R0_CurOcup.name: CurOcup
R0_CurOcup.question: If you are not currently working, former usual occupation
R0_CurOcup.description: If participant is not currently working, their former usual occupation.

R0_LeftEducAge.name: Q1_9
R0_LeftEducAge.question: How old were you when you left full-time education(if you are not currently a student)?
R0_LeftEducAge.description: Age participant was when they left full-time education, if not currently a student.

R0_MaritalStatus.name: Q1_10_1
R0_MaritalStatus.question: What is your current marital status?

R0_PartnerOccup.name: Q1_10occu
R0_PartnerOccup.question: If married or cohabiting, what is your husband’s/partner’s current or former usual occupation?
R0_PartnerOccup.description: If married or cohabiting, the current or former usual occupation of the partner of the participant.

R0_EthnGroup.name: Q1_11_1_fast
R0_EthnGroup.question: To which ethnic group do you consider you belong? (single choice)
R0_EthnGroup.description: Single choice question about which ethnic group the participant belongs to.

R0_EthnGroupWhite.name: Q1_11_1
R0_EthnGroupWhite.question: To which ethnic group do you consider you belong? - White
R0_EthnGroupWhite.description: Participant considers themselves White, from the UK or not.

R0_EthnGroupIndian.name: Q1_11_2
R0_EthnGroupIndian.question: To which ethnic group do you consider you belong? - Indian

R0_EthnGroupJAshk.question: To which ethnic group do you consider you belong? - Jewish-Ashkenazi
R0_EthnGroupJAshk.description: Participant considers themselves Jewish, Ashkenazi or other.

R0_EthnGroupBlkCarib.question: To which ethnic group do you consider you belong? - Black-Caribbean

R0_EthnGroupPakistani.question: To which ethnic group do you consider you belong? - Pakistani

R0_EthnGroupJSeph.question: To which ethnic group do you consider you belong? - Jewish-Sephardi

R0_EthnGroupBlkAfr.name: Q1_11_7
R0_EthnGroupBlkAfr.question: To which ethnic group do you consider you belong? - Black-African

R0_EthnGroupBngldsh.name: Q1_11_8
R0_EthnGroupBngldsh.question: To which ethnic group do you consider you belong? - Bangladeshi

R0_EthnGroupNone.question: To which ethnic group do you consider you belong? - None of these
R0_EthnGroupNone.description: Participant considers themselves none of these ethnicities.

R0_EthnGroupBlkOther.question: To which ethnic group do you consider you belong? - Black-Other

R0_EthnGroupChinese.question: To which ethnic group do you consider you belong? - Chinese

R0_EthnGroupSelfDesc.description: Participant considers themselves another self described ethnicity.
